summary: This module implements a handler for the Gemma open‑source language model. It extends the generic OSSHandler and provides logic to transform user and system messages into the format expected by Gemma, including role substitution, system‑prompt conversion, and consolidation of consecutive user inputs.
business_intent: Enable seamless integration of the Gemma model into the function‑call leaderboard framework by supplying a ready‑to‑use prompt preparation layer, allowing the model to be evaluated and benchmarked for function‑calling tasks.
